alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 11:51AM CDT until March 30 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southeastern Sabine Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1150 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hornbeck, or 9 miles northwest of Anacoco, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Natchitoches and southeastern Sabine Parishes, including the following locations... Kisatchie, Cloutierville, Melrose, Mount Carmel, Bellwood, Chopin, Gorum and Florien. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
